content.text: Hi! I'm new to this, so I hope we can get to know each other. What's your name?
I'm ten years old, and my name is participant_2. I'm from Portland, Oregon and I play for the Baltimore Orioles. What about you?
My name is participant_1, and I'm from [hometown]. I'm a softball player, too! I'm curious about how you overcame your shyness.
I used to be really shy, but I started running a lot and it helped me get out of my shell. I also like to play video games, and that helps me meet new people. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to make clothes, and I also love to read. I'm a bit of a bookworm. I'm curious about your family - do you have any siblings?
I have two older sisters, and we're all really close. We love to play games together, and we're always there for each other. What about your family?
I have a mom, dad, and one older brother. We're not as close as your family, but we still love each other. I'm the youngest, and I'm always getting into trouble!
It sounds like you have a great family. I'm glad we're friends!
Me too! I'm excited to get to know you better.
